15 LoopStack¶

class LoopStack[source]

LoopStack(iterable=[], name=None) :: Loop

Basic loop class

create_event[source]

create_event(event_name)

events[source]

events(*enames)

TRAIN_EVENTS = ["PROCESS","FORWARD","LOSS_CALC","BACKWARD","OPT_STEP","METRICS"]
EVAL_EVENTS = ["PROCESS","EVAL_WRAP","FORWARD","LOSS_CALC","METRICS"]

class TrainLoop(LoopStack):
    def __init__(self,data_iter):
        self.from_loops(ProgressBar,*events(*TRAIN_EVENTS))
        self.__init__(data_iter,)

train_loop = TrainLoop(range(20))
train_loop

LoopStack>:TrainLoop
	Layer>>:ProgressBar
	Layer>>:PROCESS
	Layer>>:FORWARD
	Layer>>:LOSS_CALC
	Layer>>:BACKWARD
	Layer>>:OPT_STEP
	Layer>>:METRICS
train_loop.PROCESS

layer:>>>PROCESS
train_loop

train_loop.run()
